channel.title: Google Cloud Platform on Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Google Cloud Platform on Documentation

item.title: GCP Setup
item.description: installing SDK (Includes CLI) https://cloud.google.com/sdk/docs/ linux echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/cloud.google.gpg] https://packages.cloud.google.com/apt cloud-sdk main" | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google-cloud-sdk.list curl https://packages.cloud.google.com/apt/doc/apt-key.gpg | sudo apt-key --keyring /usr/share/keyrings/cloud.google.gpg add - sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install google-cloud-sdk mac download sdk https://cloud.google.com/sdk/docs/#mac run install.sh Basic configuration gcloud init gcloud config configurations list zone us-east4-a
